title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 182.16 - Penalties and enforcement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 182.16 - Penalties and enforcement

State Regulations

Any person who violates this Part or any license, permit or
order issued by the department pursuant to section 11-0535 of the Environmental

Conservation Law or pursuant to the provisions of this Part may be liable for
all penalties and other remedies provided for in the Environmental Conservation

Law. Such penalties and remedies may be in addition to any other penalty or
remedy available under any other law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
182.16

Adopted

New

York State Register December 4, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 49, eff. 12/4/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
